# Novu

> Novu is the open-source notification infrastructure platform for developers. Build multi-channel notifications (in-app, email, SMS, push, chat) with a single API.

Novu provides a unified platform for managing all notification channels, with features like notification workflows, digest engines, subscriber preferences, and a customizable inbox component. It's designed for both developers who want code-level control and product teams who need a no-code interface.

## Products

### Inbox
- [Inbox Overview](https://novu.co/inbox/): Full-stack, customizable in-app notification inbox component
- Add in-app notifications with minimal code using React, Next.js, or vanilla JavaScript
- Features: real-time notifications, user preferences, HMAC encryption, customizable UI

### Framework
- [Framework Overview](https://novu.co/framework/): Code-backed notification workflows
- Define workflows in TypeScript, access local data, apply advanced logic
- Type-safe with JSON schema validation
- Integrates with React Email, MJML, and popular frameworks (NestJS, Express, Remix)

### Digest
- [Digest Overview](https://novu.co/digest/): Batch and consolidate notifications to reduce overload
- Configurable digest strategies (time-based, count-based, cron expressions)
- Prevent notification fatigue while keeping users informed

## Notification Channels
- **In-App**: Real-time notifications within your application
- **Email**: Transactional and marketing emails with visual editor
- **SMS**: Text message notifications via providers like Twilio
- **Push**: Mobile and web push notifications
- **Chat**: Messaging platform integrations (Slack, Discord, etc.)

## Key Pages

- [Homepage](https://novu.co/): Overview of Novu's notification infrastructure
- [Pricing](https://novu.co/pricing/): Plans from Free (10K events/month) to Enterprise
- [Use Cases](https://novu.co/usecases/): Multi-channel notifications, content management, user engagement
- [Security](https://novu.co/security/): SOC 2, encryption, compliance features
- [Contact](https://novu.co/contact-us/): Get in touch with the Novu team

## Use Cases

- [Add Notifications](https://novu.co/usecases/add-notifications/): Quickly add notification capabilities to your app
- [Multi-Channel Notifications](https://novu.co/usecases/multi-channel-notifications/): Unified delivery across all channels
- [Unified Platform](https://novu.co/usecases/unified-platform/): Single platform for all notification needs
- [Content Management](https://novu.co/usecases/content-management/): Manage notification templates and content
- [Communication Experience](https://novu.co/usecases/improve-communication-experience/): Enhance user engagement

## Documentation

- [Documentation Home](https://docs.novu.co/): Complete guides and API reference
- [Quick Start](https://docs.novu.co/quickstart): Get started in minutes
- [Framework Docs](https://docs.novu.co/framework/overview): Code-based workflow documentation
- [API Reference](https://docs.novu.co/api-reference): REST API documentation
- [SDKs](https://docs.novu.co/sdks): Node.js, Python, Go, Ruby, and more

## Developer Resources

- [Dashboard](https://dashboard.novu.co/): Novu Cloud dashboard for managing notifications
- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/novuhq/novu): Open-source codebase (35K+ stars)
- [NPM Packages](https://www.npmjs.com/org/novu): @novu/node, @novu/react, @novu/nextjs
- [Blog](https://novu.co/blog/): Technical articles and product updates
- [Discord Community](https://discord.gg/novu): Community support and discussions

## Integrations

Novu integrates with popular tools and services:
- **Email Providers**: SendGrid, Mailgun, Postmark, Amazon SES, Resend
- **SMS Providers**: Twilio, Vonage, Plivo, MessageBird
- **Push Providers**: Firebase Cloud Messaging, Apple Push Notification Service
- **Chat Providers**: Slack, Discord, Microsoft Teams
- **Frameworks**: React, Next.js, Remix, NestJS, Express, Astro
- **Content Tools**: React Email, MJML
- **Auth**: Clerk, Auth0
- **Feature Flags**: LaunchDarkly

## Pricing Tiers

- **Free**: $0/month - 10K workflow runs, all channels, 3 team members
- **Pro**: From $30/month - 30K+ workflow runs, 7-day retention, remove branding
- **Team**: From $250/month - 250K+ workflow runs, 10 environments, RBAC
- **Enterprise**: Custom - 5M+ workflow runs, SOC 2, HIPAA, dedicated support

## Company

Novu is an open-source company backed by leading investors. The platform processes millions of notifications for companies like MongoDB, Unity, Siemens, Roche, and UNOPS.

- Founded: 2021
- Headquarters: Tel Aviv, Israel
- Open Source: MIT License
- GitHub Stars: 35,000+
